function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of enforcement of social distancing measures in public spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and transmission in urban green spaces","Mitigation":"Implement strict enforcement measures and penalties for non-compliance","Technologies":"Surveillance cameras, drones, and mobile tracking apps for monitoring social distancing","People":"Visitors to urban green spaces, local residents, and workers in the green spaces","Owner":"Local governments, public health authorities, and city management organizations"},{"Description":"Inconsistent implementation of lockdown directives and measures","Impact":"Unequal protection of urban green spaces and variability in disease control","Mitigation":"Standardize lockdown directives and measures across all countries and regions, provide clear guidelines for enforcement","Technologies":"Communication technology for sharing best practices and guidelines, geolocation and mapping tools for tracking lockdown compliance","People":"Managers of urban green spaces, local residents, and visitors","Owner":"National governments, local governments, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Delay in implementing social distancing measures in some countries","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and spread in urban green spaces due to delayed restrictions","Mitigation":"Develop early warning systems for rapid implementation of social distancing measures, strengthen regional coordination for consistent response","Technologies":"Data analytics for predicting infection hotspots, communication technology for rapid information sharing, and coordination","People":"Managers of urban green spaces, local residents, and visitors","Owner":"National governments, regional health agencies, and public health authorities"}]}
